articles.author: Channing Reid
articles.title: Airshows To Look Forward To In The Rest Of 2023 - Simple Flying
articles.description: Missed the Paris Air Show? No need to worry – air shows elsewhere are planned throughout the remainder of the year.
articles.content: With the Paris Air Show roaring back for its 54th edition after taking a break due to the pandemic, we’ve seen more than 150 aircraft take to the skies, historic aircraft orders, and the latest devel… [+4176 chars]
